name: SolarCalibur
description:
The Sun has deemed Pluto no longer worthy of planetary status, and he is NOT happy.  In fact, he's out to kick some asteroids!  Pluto won't stop until he takes out the Sun, himself... but he must fight through the 8-planet guard first!

This game was developed as part of PIGSquad's first Summer Slowjam - a weeklong challenge to produce a playable minigame centered around the theme, "The World is Alive."

June, 2018
